articles.title: Leonardo Palomera-Tapia, PhD
articles.contents:
#’ 
Professional
I’m an enthusiastic professional educator and statistical consultant with over ten years of experience collaborating on data analysis with diverse partners in industry, banking, energy, and education.
My previous work experiences include supporting …
I am currently a Data Scientist at Data Society, working remotely from my home in Denver, Colorado.
Personal
Contact
Want to chat? Feel free to contact me on email, Twitter, or LinkedIn. I hope to hear from you!
R feeds
This blog feeds into R Weekly. Consider adding your blog or subscribing to see all of R’s latest and greatest!
